entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this morning then light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
